sentences.sContent: He dismissed arguments postulating differing standards for human rights in different cultures and regions.
sentences.sCn: 他无法接受的是假定人权标准在不同文化和地区有所不同。

synos.tran: 假定；要求；视…为理所当然

words.tran: 请愿者；假定者；宣福申请人，列圣申请人

trans.tranCn: 假定；要求；视…为理所当然
trans.tranOther: to suggest that something might have happened or be true
something believed to be true, on which an argument or scientific discussion is based
